title: Fars’ Anticlines
content: Surrounding the cities of Shiraz and Kazeroon that are situated in the middle of Zagros mountain range’s southern part can be seen numerous anticlines. These anticlines, being sheared apart by the rivers, faults, as well as work of erosion has created beautiful tectonic landscapes.
